text: Ingangarir ia amua men akurvazir kam, a ian arazir aghuim bar azenaram anekagham. Eghtɨ me fogh suam, ia Kraisɨn akar aghuim guizɨn a inigha, deraghavɨra an akamɨn gɨn zui. Eghtɨ me bizir avɨrir ia me ganɨngiziba, ko bizir ia gumazamizir igharazibagh anɨngiziba uaghan dar gan, egh Godɨn ziam fam.
